1: <mistake>@//dang</mistake> sbyor bar bya//lho las dbu ma bzung nas su//thig le <mistake>ngaro</mistake> ldan par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das shin tu dga' <mistake>pa'i</mistake> rdo rje sems dpas rnam par gzigs ma <mistake>dang //</mistake>
2: <mistake>sgrob</mistake> ma <mistake>dangs</mistake> 'dzin ma dang khro <mistake>gter</mistake> ma zhes pa'i <mistake>pad ma'i</mistake> gtso mo'i lha mo <mistake>bzhis</mistake> gsungs pa'o//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//thig le u yig sbyor bar bya//dbus las dang
3: po bzung <mistake>l dang//byang</mistake> <mistake>nas</mistake> dbu ma gang yin pa//dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te//de ni rtag par lci bar 'gyur//lho las dang po bzung nas su//thig le dang ni <mistake>mnam</mistake> por ldan//nub nas
4: dbu ma pa nyid la//i yig dang ni ldan <mistake>ar</mistake> bya//dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas//dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor bya//me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid//sgra yig u yis rnam par <mistake>brgya//</mistake>
5: rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la <mistake>yang//yi</mistake> ge u dang mnyam ldan la//thig le nga ro yang dag ldan//dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa//a med nub kyi dang <mistake>poo//zhes</mistake> bcom ldan <mistake>'ngs</mistake> <mistake>rdo</mistake> rje 'dzin
6: pas gsungs so//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya//dbus las tha ma bzung <mistake>bdang//sgra</mistake> yig <mistake>dang</mistake> ldan pa yi//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te//dbus
7: <mistake>/las</mistake> dbu ma pa <mistake>'yid</mistake> <mistake>la //spa</mistake> yig i ni sbyor bar <mistake>bya// dbang</mistake> ldan <mistake>phy</mistake> rol pa la yang //dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya//dbus las dang po bzung <mistake>pa</mistake> dang //byang nas dbu ma pa la <mistake>yang//dbus</mistake> las
8: <mistake>/tha</mistake> ma dang sbyar te//de ni <mistake>rtas</mistake> lci <mistake>bgyur</mistake> <mistake>ba//de</mistake> bzhin dbus las tha ma <mistake>yang//sgrayig</mistake> u dang sbyor bar bya//e yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i//byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya//bden bral phyi
